Bromod:RadialBlind.NAME: Radial Blind
Bromod:RadialBlind.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 bromod:Blur. NL Apply !M! Weak to all enemies.
Bromod:RadialBlind.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 bromod:Blur. NL Apply !M! Weak and !M! Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

Bromod:FastHands.NAME: Fast Hands
Bromod:FastHands.DESCRIPTION: Discard a random card from your hand and draw two cards.
Bromod:FastHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard one card from your hand and draw two cards.

Bromod:ChillingReload.NAME: Chilling Reload
Bromod:ChillingReload.DESCRIPTION: Draw one attack from your draw pile. Gain !M! bromod:Cold.

Bromod:RendingStrike.NAME: Rending Strike
Bromod:RendingStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! bromod:Bleed. NL Apply !Bromod:SecondMagic! Weak.

Bromod:LifeStrike.NAME: Life Strike
Bromod:LifeStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and heal for the amount of unblocked damage dealt. NL Increase the cost of this card by [E]  this combat.

Bromod:FashionFrame.NAME: Fashion Frame
Bromod:FashionFrame.DESCRIPTION: Draw one card and upgrade all cards in your hand. NL Exhaust.
Bromod:FashionFrame.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw one card and upgrade all cards in your hand.

Bromod:Forma.NAME: Forma
Bromod:Forma.DESCRIPTION: Discard a random card from your hand. NL It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.
Bromod:Forma.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Discard a card from your hand. NL It costs 0 this combat. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:RadialJavelin.NAME: Radial Javelin
Bromod:RadialJavelin.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! Strength per enemy hit.

Bromod:ExaltedCancel.NAME: Exalted Cancel
Bromod:ExaltedCancel.DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose bromod:Exalted. NL Add [#f1bf2c]Exalted[] [#f1bf2c]Blade[] to your hand.
Bromod:ExaltedCancel.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Retain. NL Lose bromod:Exalted. NL Lose bromod:Chromatic_Blade. NL Add [#f1bf2c]Exalted[] [#f1bf2c]Blade[] to your hand.

Bromod:Redirection.NAME: Redirection
Bromod:Redirection.DESCRIPTION: Next turn, gain block equal to !M! times your current block.

Bromod:VitalSense.NAME: Vital Sense
Bromod:VitalSense.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, deal !D! again.
Bromod:VitalSense.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, deal !D! two additional times.

Bromod:ShatteringImpact.NAME: Shattering Impact
Bromod:ShatteringImpact.DESCRIPTION: Remove all block from the enemy and deal !D! Damage. If the enemy had no block, apply !M! Vulnerable.

Bromod:PressurePoint.NAME: Pressure Point
Bromod:PressurePoint.DESCRIPTION: Your next attack deals double damage.

Bromod:BodyCount.NAME: Body Count
Bromod:BodyCount.DESCRIPTION: bromod:Combo. NL When you kill an enemy, add a random bromod:Combo card to your hand.

Bromod:SlipMagazine.NAME: Slip Magazine
Bromod:SlipMagazine.DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw a card.
Bromod:SlipMagazine.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever a card is Exhausted, draw 2 cards.

Bromod:QuickDraw.NAME: Quick Draw
Bromod:QuickDraw.DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If Drawn, draw a card. NL If discarded, draw a card and discard a card
Bromod:QuickDraw.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Unplayable. NL If Drawn, draw a card. NL If discarded, draw !M! cards and discard 1 card. NL If Exhausted, draw !M! cards and Exhaust a card.

Bromod:BloodRush.NAME: Blood Rush
Bromod:BloodRush.DESCRIPTION: This turn, all your attacks benefit from bromod:Combo.

Bromod:BriefRespite.NAME: Brief Respite
Bromod:BriefRespite.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you use a card, if you have no Block, gain Block equal to !M! times the cost of that card.

Bromod:FinishingTouch.NAME: Finishing Touch
Bromod:FinishingTouch.DESCRIPTION: bromod:Combo. Exhaust. NL Deal !Bromod:ComboDamage! damage. NL This card's bromod:Combo stacks indefinitely.

Bromod:Fury.NAME: Fury
Bromod:Fury.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-attack cards in your hand and add a random attack to your hand for each exhausted card. NL Exhaust.
Bromod:Fury.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust all non-attack cards in your hand and add a random attack to your hand for each exhausted card. They cost 0 this turn. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:KillingBlow.NAME: Killing Blow
Bromod:KillingBlow.DESCRIPTION: bromod:Combo. Exhaust. NL Deal !Bromod:ComboDamage! Damage and, if the attack kills the target, regain the current energy cost of the card and add a copy of it to your hand.

Bromod:Maglev.NAME: Maglev
Bromod:Maglev.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw 1 card. If the card is Bullet Jump, play it immediately for free.
Bromod:Maglev.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block and draw 1 card. If the card is Bullet Jump, play it immediately for free. NL Next turn gain !B! Block.

Bromod:OrganShatter.NAME: Organ Shatter
Bromod:OrganShatter.DESCRIPTION: bromod:Combo. NL Deal !D! Damage. Apply !Bromod:ComboMagic! Vulnerable. NL bromod:Combo affects this card's Vulnerable amount instead of damage.

Bromod:Patagium.NAME: Patagium
Bromod:Patagium.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play an attack this turn, gain !M! bromod:Flight. NL This bromod:Flight is not conserved next turn.

Bromod:PointBlank.NAME: Point Blank
Bromod:PointBlank.DESCRIPTION: Deliver a single blow dealing !D! Damage to ALL enemies per attack in your hand. Discard all attacks in your hand. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:PointStrike.NAME: Point Strike
Bromod:PointStrike.DESCRIPTION: For the next !M! turns, apply 3 Vulnerable to target. Then, target receives damage equal to their Vulnerable amount.

Bromod:Provoked.NAME: Provoked
Bromod:Provoked.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive Vulnerable, gain the same amount of Strength.

Bromod:ReflexCoil.NAME: Reflex Coil
Bromod:ReflexCoil.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of al cards in your hand by 1 this turn.

Bromod:RelentlessCombination.NAME: Relentless Combination
Bromod:RelentlessCombination.DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you use a bromod:Combo card, draw another bromod:Combo card. NL Exhaust.
Bromod:RelentlessCombination.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This turn, whenever you use a bromod:Combo card, draw another bromod:Combo card.

Bromod:SeismicWave.NAME: Seismic Wave
Bromod:SeismicWave.DESCRIPTION: You can only use this card if you have bromod:Flight. Loose your bromod:Flight and deal !D! Damage to All enemies, plus !M! per stack of bromod:Flight.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You need #bFlight for this card to have any effect.

Bromod:Serration.NAME: Serration
Bromod:Serration.DESCRIPTION: Select an attack in your hand and increase it's base damage by !M! % for the combat. NL Exhaust

Bromod:SpeedTrigger.NAME: Speed Trigger
Bromod:SpeedTrigger.DESCRIPTION: Play the next !M! top cards from your deck. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:SplitChamber.NAME: Split Chamber
Bromod:SplitChamber.DESCRIPTION: Choose a card in your hand. For the next !M! rounds, add a copy of it to your hand at the start of your turn. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:SteelCharge.NAME: Steel Charge
Bromod:SteelCharge.DESCRIPTION: Gain 1 Strength for each !M! cards in your deck.

Bromod:TacticalPump.NAME: Tactical Pump
Bromod:TacticalPump.DESCRIPTION: Discard your hand and draw the same amount of cards.

Bromod:TargetCracker.NAME: Target Cracker
Bromod:TargetCracker.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the enemy is Weakened, deal !D! damage an additional time
Bromod:TargetCracker.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage. If the enemy is Weakened, deal !D! damage two additional times

Bromod:Stretch.NAME: Stretch
Bromod:Stretch.DESCRIPTION: Non-attack damage NL ( like that from effects such as Thorns ), is dealt to all enemies

Bromod:Adaptation.NAME: Adaptation
Bromod:Adaptation.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you receive attack damage, ALL enemies lose !M! Strength for the turn.

Bromod:Berserker.NAME: Berserker
Bromod:Berserker.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you play !M! attacks in a single turn, gain [E]  and draw a card.

Bromod:Blaze.NAME: Blaze
Bromod:Blaze.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength for this turn. NL Gain !Bromod:SecondMagic! bromod:Heat

Bromod:ToxicFlight.NAME: Toxic Flight
Bromod:ToxicFlight.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Gain 1 bromod:Flight. NL Gain !M! bromod:Toxin. NL This card counts as a Bullet Jump.

Bromod:FocusEnergy.NAME: Focus Energy
Bromod:FocusEnergy.DESCRIPTION: Reduce the cost of a random card in you hand to 0 this turn. NL Gain !M! bromod:Electricity.

Bromod:VoltaicStrike.NAME: Voltaic Strike
Bromod:VoltaicStrike.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !M! additional damage to ALL enemies two times.
Bromod:VoltaicStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage, then deal !M! additional damage to ALL enemies two times. NL Gain !Bromod:SecondMagic! bromod:Electricity.

Bromod:ThermiteRounds.NAME: Thermite Rounds
Bromod:ThermiteRounds.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 bromod:Burn three times.
Bromod:ThermiteRounds.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage and apply 1 bromod:Burn three times. NL Gain !M! bromod:Heat.

Bromod:Frostbite.NAME: Frostbite
Bromod:Frostbite.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! bromod:Slow and deal damage equal to the target's bromod:Slow amount.
Bromod:Frostbite.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !M! bromod:Slow and deal damage equal to the target's bromod:Slow amount. NL Gain !Bromod:SecondMagic! bromod:Cold.

Bromod:ToxicBarrage.NAME: Toxic Barrage
Bromod:ToxicBarrage.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply the same amount of Poison to ALL enemies.
Bromod:ToxicBarrage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply the same amount of Poison to ALL enemies. NL Gain !M! bromod:Toxin.

Bromod:ConditionOverload.NAME: Condition Overload
Bromod:ConditionOverload.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage and apply for each power the enemy has. NL Exhaust.

Bromod:Continuity.NAME: Continuity
Bromod:Continuity.DESCRIPTION: Gain a copy of one of your powers at random.

Bromod:DriftingContact.NAME: Drifting Contact
Bromod:DriftingContact.DESCRIPTION: bromod:Combo. NL Gain !Bromod:ComboMagic! bromod:Elemental. NL Combo affects this card's bromod:Elemental amount.

Bromod:HellsChamber.NAME: Hell's Chamber
Bromod:HellsChamber.DESCRIPTION: Attacks cost 0. Whenever you play an attack (except Basic Strikes), exhaust it.

Bromod:Intensify.NAME: Intensify
Bromod:Intensify.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you apply a Debuff, increase it's amount by !M!

Bromod:Thunderbolt.NAME: Thunderbolt
Bromod:Thunderbolt.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! bromod:Blast. NL bromod:Blast has a 10% chance to affect you.

Bromod:LethalTorrent.NAME: Lethal Torrent
Bromod:LethalTorrent.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, add a copy of the first card you draw to your hand.
Bromod:LethalTorrent.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a copy of the first card you draw.

Bromod:QuickThinking.NAME: Quick Thinking
Bromod:QuickThinking.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, gain !M! temporary HP for each unspent [E]  you have.

Bromod:Foundry.NAME: The Foundry
Bromod:Foundry.DESCRIPTION: At the start of every other turn, exhaust a card from your hand and, next turn, add a random card to your hand.
